name: Plot Holes - Early Access Demo
description:
Plot Holes is a 2D Story Platformer that is currently in development and soon to be released on Steam.  

The product you see here was made in 45 hours of non-stop work. This project is a really personal story and will slowly develop as time goes on.

It is currently free to download, donations are optional. If you liked what you played, please let me know. All support means the world to me. <3 

THIS IS EARLY ACCESS. I apologize for any bugs or holes you may find along the way. Cover art will be updated in the future as well as a much more organized layout for this page. 

-Cossie
